TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult BinaryDelegate<TArg1,TArg2,TResult>(TArg1 A_0, TArg2 A_1);
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryDelegate`3<TArg1, TArg2, TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.typeparam: The return type of the delegate.
Docs.summary: Describes a two-argument delegate. You use it to specify the arguments and return type of the delegate.
Docs.returns: The return type of the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate is the generic equivalent of the STL/CLR `binary_delegate` class. For more information, see [binary_delegate (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52a9291a-e354-4b9e-a035-78dac1179ec5).
